doc.after: In late 1862, Jumbo was sold to the Jardin des Plantes in Paris.[9] Jumbo was probably brought to his new home in either late 1862 or early 1863. The French were disappointed with him; they thought he would be larger. Jumbo lived in the Rotunda for Large Herbivores with two Asian elephants, several camels and giraffes, and a hippopotamus.[10]
